content.question: The phrase "starched and ironed her face (first sentence) is best interpreted to mean that Janie

choices.label: stiffened her resolve to confront painful reminders of her past
erected a façade appropriate to a formal occasion
resolved her emotional ambivalence toward her late husband
determined to keep her grief under control during the funeral

content.answer: erected a façade appropriate to a formal occasion

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
